Class Card

java.lang.Object
Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColorWildCard, DrawTwoCard, NormalCard, ReverseCard, SkipCard
public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
The Card is a abstract class that implements card in Uno game
Since:
4/14/2020

    • action

      public abstract boolean action​(GameManagement manager) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      This method is an abstract method and implements each card action when it's chosen.
      Parameters:
      manager - the class that manages the game
      Returns:
      the boolean if action is doable true and false otherwise
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - the interrupted exception

    • canPutOver

      public abstract boolean canPutOver​(Card currentCard)
      It's an abstract method that shows if it's possible to put over card.
      Parameters:
      currentCard - the current card of game
      Returns:
      a boolean true if it's possible to put over card and false otherwise
